hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EOWL.EOWL_ID, EOWL.CREATOR, EOWL.CREATE_TIME, EOWL.MODIFIER, EOWL.MODIFY_TIME, EOWL.REC_VER, EOWL.REC_STATUS, EOWL.ORG_ID, EOWL.EOWL_PROVIDER_CODE, EOWL.EOWL_PROVIDER_NAME, EOWL.EOWL_WORK_TYPE_CODE, EOWL.EOWL_WORK_TYPE_NAME, EOWL.EOWL_PROVIDER_ROLE_CODE, EOWL.EOWL_PROVIDER_ROLE_NAME, EOWL.EOWL_WHETHER_RELEASE, EOWL.EOWL_AUTO_RELEASE, EOWL.EOWL_RELEASE_SYSTEM_CODE, EOWL.EOWL_RELEASE_SYSTEM_NAME, EOWL.EOWL_INTERFACE_CODE, EOWL.EOWL_INTERFACE_NAME, EOWL.EOWL_SENDER_CODE, EOWL.EOWL_RECEIVER_CODE, EOWL.EOWL_EDI_REFERENCE_1, EOWL.EOWL_EDI_REFERENCE_2, EOWL.EOWL_EDI_REFERENCE_3, EOWL.EOWL_EDI_REFERENCE_4, EOWL.EOWL_EDI_REFERENCE_5, EOWL.EOWL_REMARK from EO_WORK_RELEASE EOWL where 1=1 <<and EOWL.ORG_ID = :orgId>> <<and EOWL.EOWL_AUTO_RELEASE = :eowlAutoRelease>> <<and EOWL.EOWL_INTERFACE_CODE = :eowlInterfaceCode>> <<and EOWL.EOWL_INTERFACE_NAME LIKE :eowlInterfaceName>> <<and EOWL.EOWL_PROVIDER_CODE = :eowlProviderCode>> <<and EOWL.EOWL_PROVIDER_NAME LIKE :eowlProviderName>> <<and EOWL.EOWL_WHETHER_RELEASE = :eowlWhetherRelease>> <<and EOWL.EOWL_WORK_TYPE_CODE = :eowlWorkTypeCode>> <<and EOWL.EOWL_WORK_TYPE_NAME LIKE :eowlWorkTypeName>> order by EOWL.MODIFY_TIME desc
